name: Spicy Tuna Roll
description: A delicious roll filled with fresh tuna, spicy mayo, and cucumber, wrapped in seaweed and rice.

name: Dragon Roll
description: An impressive roll featuring eel, avocado, cucumber, topped with thin avocado slices and eel sauce.

name: Rainbow Roll
description: A colorful roll topped with assorted fresh fish slices over a California roll base.

name: California Roll
description: Classic roll with crab meat, avocado, and cucumber wrapped in seaweed and rice.

name: Tempura Shrimp Roll
description: Crispy tempura shrimp combined with avocado and cucumber, drizzled with spicy mayo.

name: Vegetable Roll
description: A fresh roll packed with cucumber, avocado, carrot, and asparagus, perfect for vegetarians.

name: Salmon Avocado Roll
description: Delicious roll featuring fresh salmon and creamy avocado, wrapped in seaweed and rice.

name: Spicy Crab Roll
description: A spicy and creamy crab roll with cucumber and a touch of chili mayo.
